original_text: (For all the Athenians and strangers which were there spent their time in nothing else, but either to tell, or to hear some new thing.)
korean_text: 모든 아덴 사람과 거기서 나그네 된 외국인들이 가장 새로운 것을 말하고 듣는 것 이외에는 달리 시간을 쓰지 않음이더라

sentences.original_text: For all the Athenians and strangers which were there
spent their time in nothing else
but either to tell, or to hear some new thing.
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 새로운 것을 말하거나 듣기만 했다.
